name: 101 - SOPs overview
description: Provides an overview of the FDPS and STDDS OPS from the RAG database
initial_prompt: Tell me about the FDPS and STDDS systems and data.

name: 102 - SOPs analysis
description: Provides an analysis of the FDPS and STDDS OPS from the RAG database
initial_prompt: Tell me what types of outcomes I could expect by analyzing data from these systems.

name: 301 - FDPS overview
description: Overview to number of documents and types of data in FDPS database
initial_prompt: How many FDPS documents are in the database and what types of data do they contain?

name: 302 - STDDS overview
description: Overview to number of documents and types of data in STDDS database
initial_prompt: How many STDDS documents are in the database and what types of data do they contain?

name: 303 - Summary of Inbound Flights
description: Describes and lists inbound flights into an airport
initial_prompt: Tell me about distinct  flights that are inbound to {{Airport}}

name: 304 - Flight Instance Info
description: Describes and lists inbound flights into an airport

name: 401 - Planes on the ground
description: Provides a report of planes that are on the ground taxiing
initial_prompt: Provide me a summary of distinct flights on the ground and taxiing in {{airport}}.

name: 402 - Schedule Compliance Check
description: Find flights behind estimated arrival times
initial_prompt: Which flights are currently delayed arriving into {{airport}}?

name: 403 - Flight Details from STDDS
description: STDDS Flight Details for a specific flight
initial_prompt: Tell me what you know about {{Flight_Number}} from STDDS

name: 404 - Flight Details from FDPS
description: FDPS Flight Details for a specific flight
initial_prompt: Now tell me what you know, including all historical data, about this flight from FDPS

name: 405 - Comprehensive Flight Report
description: Generate a combined report from both STDDS and FDPS for a specific flight
initial_prompt: Generate me a report of both the STDDS and FDPS data for this flight.

name: 406 - Updated Comprehensive Flight Report
description: Provide an updated report including all new and historical data from both STDDS and FDPS for a specific flight
initial_prompt: Provide me an updated report, including all new and historical data from both STDDS and FDPS for this flight.

name: 501 - Basic Flight Plan Access Test
description: Verify connection and retrieve sample flight plan documents
initial_prompt: Get me an example flight plan document from the database.

name: 502 - Altitude Compliance Monitoring
description: Identify altitude deviations from assigned flight levels
initial_prompt: List any flights not maintaining their assigned cruise altitude within {{Altitude Tolerance}} feet.

name: 503 - Flight Adherence Analysis
description: Compare actual vs. planned flight path for specific flights
initial_prompt: How well has flight {{Flight ID}} adhered to its flight plan?

name: 502 - Comprehensive Flight Performance Report
description: Generate a detailed HTML report on flight performance metrics
initial_prompt: Generate me a html report containing a summary of the performance of AAL1584. Take into account its filed flight plans, how those plans changed overtime, its enroute performance and its surface movements and performance. Provide key insights and look for delays in taxi time and excessive taxi waits. Make sure to call as many agents in parallel as you want
